Kellan Lutz visits Stella Artois’ Cannes Cinema Club. Timeline Photos

Kellan Lutz, co-star of the Twilight series, will visit Stella Artois’ Cannes Cinema Club on Saturday to meet our guests and answer your questions.  Tell us what you’d ask Kellan and we’ll choose the best questions for his visit! Timeline Photos

For your listening pleasure…some of our favorites, now playing at the Cannes Cinema Club Music Of The Cannes Cinema Club - Volume I Listen to Music Of The Cannes Cinema Club - Volume I Cloudcast by Cannes Cinema Club on Mixcloud

Last night we found a few misplaced items.  If you have lost a yellow striped boiler suit with samurai sword, a white boiler suit and bowler hat or a pink dressing gown then fear not they are here, in the Cannes Cinema Club cloakroom. Timeline Photos
The VIP room at the Cannes Cinema Club - full of actors, directors, writers, producers and one waterskiing instructor…there on the left. Timeline Photos
Le Trio Farouche play the Cannes Cinema Club. If you put an empty Stella Artois chalice to your ear like a shell you can hear them anywhere in the world. Timeline Photos
Mesdames et Messieurs it gives me great pleasure to re-open the doors to the Cannes Cinema Club 50 years on since its closure. Timeline Photos
The moon is winking. The palm trees are whispering to each other. It can only mean one thing…. tonight is the grand re-opening of the Cannes Cinema Club. Timeline Photos
"Either everyone was beautiful or the lighting was great. Most probably both." Intrigued? See what's waiting for you at the Cannes Cinéma Club:  Cannes Cinema Club
The Cannes Cinema Club is said to have inspired some of the most iconic moments in film to date. What iconic film moment do you wish you had lived?  CANNES CINEMA CLUB  | Stella Artois

Not everyone will be so lucky to soak up the inspiring films and sunshine in the French Riviera this May, so allow us to bring a little bit of Cannes to you with the Stella Artois' Cannes Cinéma Club.  CANNES CINEMA CLUB  | Stella Artois

You've heard the Cold War Kids song with the Chalice Symphony 'A Million Eyes.' Now you can compose your own track using the #ChaliceSymphony sounds by downloading the sound files here: http://www.symphonydownload.com/ Chalice Symphony
Download the exclusive Cold War Kids song, ‘A Million Eyes’ featuring the Stella Artois Chalice Symphony here.  Listen and let us know your thoughts. http://bit.ly/1hCzm9r Timeline Photos

The Chalice Symphony is made up of four unique instruments created by musical craftsman Andy Cavatorta. Learn about the complete symphony here:
http://bit.ly/1jG7b9R Timeline Photos

Get a glimpse into the Cold War Kids creative process as
they write their song "A Million Eyes." Watch the video
here: Chalice Symphony: Cold War Kids Craft "A Million Eyes" The Chalice Symphony is a collaboration between Stella Artois, musical craftsman Andy Cavatorta, and rock band Cold War Kids.

Watch as Cold War Kids meet Andy Cavatorta and
experience the Chalice Symphony for the first time: Chalice Symphony: Cold War Kids Meet Andy Cavatorta The Chalice Symphony is a collaboration between Stella Artois, musical craftsman Andy Cavatorta, and rock band Cold War Kids.

Download "A Million Eyes" by Cold War Kids in collaboration with the Chalice Symphony here: A Million Eyes (From Stella Artois - The Chalice Symphony) - Single by Cold War Kids Preview and download A Million Eyes (From Stella Artois - The Chalice Symphony) - Single on iTunes. See ratings and read customer reviews.

Stella Artois launched Chalice Symphony along side Andy Cavatorta and Cold War Kids this week at 168 Bowery in New York City. The event celebrated the launch of Chalice Symphony and featured a live performance by Cold War Kids where they debuted “A Million Eyes” live for the first time. CHALICE SYMPHONY LAUNCH EVENT

We're thrilled to be featured in Esquire Magazine for our Chalice Symphony project together with Cold War Kids. View the link to read the piece: This Man Made Music Out of Beer An MIT engineer's yearlong experiment results in a new Cold War Kids song

Inspired by the Chalice Symphony instruments, our
artistic collaborators, Cold War Kids, have written a
song using all four. Download their exclusive song here: http://bit.ly/1hCzm9r Timeline Photos
Stella Artois and musical craftsman Andy Cavatorta are proud to announce Cold War Kids as our artistic collaborator on the Chalice Symphony project. Timeline Photos
Introducing the first instrument in the Chalice Symphony: The Hive. http://bit.ly/1fGjhv1 Timeline Photos
Andy Cavatorta is the craftsman of the four instruments in the Chalice Symphony. Find out more about how he came to create these masterpieces here: http://bit.ly/Mfd7ub Timeline Photos

Stella Artois is proud to present the Chalice Symphony.
View what we have crafted:  Chalice Symphony

One beautiful Chalice inspired a musical craftsman to
create four unique instruments. Behold the Chalice
Symphony, coming soon...http://bit.ly/1bFFT3t Timeline Photos

Created by local artist Lisa Mam, this Cambodia limited-edition Chalice can help provide 5 years of clean water for someone in the developing world. http://bit.ly/SABALAD

Presenting the 2017 limited-edition Brazil Chalice. Along with the Cambodia and Uganda Chalices, each purchase will provide access to 5 years of clean water for one person in the developing world. Join Stella Artois and Water.org to help end the global water crisis. http://bit.ly/SABALAD Timeline Photos

Today, Stella Artois and Water.org announce our long-term commitment to help end the global water crisis. We’re partnering to make clean water accessible to millions of people in need — and you can play a part. Purchasing a limited-edition Stella Artois Chalice helps provide 5 years of clean water to someone in the developing world. www.buyaladyadrink.com Phantom Pour

Behind every Chalice is a chance to change the world.
Each limited-edition Chalice helps provide 5 years of clean water for 1 person in the developing world. Leave your mark with one of your own at www.BuyALadyADrink.com. Timeline Photos

We're continuing our partnership by helping Water.org provide clean drinking water. With the purchase of the 2016 limited-edition Chalice, you can help bring 5 years of clean water to 1 person in the developing world.

There's nothing more beautiful than the gift of clean water. And together with Water.org you can give five years of clean drinking water with the purchase of one special edition #BuyALadyADrink chalice. www.BuyALadyADrink.com #GiveBeautifully Timeline Photos

Here’s to YOU and the 73,000 limited edition chalices purchased around the world so far. Thanks to your support, we’re helping to provide people in the developing world with one of earth's most precious resources: clean water. This #EarthDay, show us a picture of your chalice with #BuyALadyADrink to join us and Water.org in toasting to a better world.

Stella Artois has partnered with Water.org to give women in developing countries access to clean water. 

1 limited-edition chalice provides 5 years of clean water to a woman in a developing country. We’ll drink to that. 

Get yours at BuyALadyADrink.com

Celebrate #WorldWaterDay by helping to stop daily journeys for water. Stella Artois is partnering with Water.org to help provide access to clean water for women in the developing world. Just 1 limited-edition chalice can provide 5 years of clean water for 1 person. Learn more about how you can help at BuyaLadyaDrink.com

Every day, women in the developing world walk hours for clean water. Teresa spends up to 21 hours a week collecting it. Help stop these journeys at BuyALadyADrink.com Timeline Photos

Cheers to you! We’ve sold 10,000 limited-edition chalices to help women in developing countries get access to clean water. Thank you for joining us in this cause.

Water for laundry, hygiene and hydration. Darusalem carries all 44 lbs of this burden every day. Stella Artois is partnering with Water.org to help provide access to clean water for women in the developing world. Help end the journeys at BuyALadyADrink.com Timeline Photos

Every day, women in the developing world walk hours for Water.org Imagine replacing your morning coffee with a 2-hour journey to collect water. Help stop these journeys at BuyALadyADrink.com Timeline Photos

1 in 9 people around the world lack access to clean water. Stella Artois is partnering with Water.org to help provide access to clean water for women in the developing world. Learn how you can help at BuyALadyADrink.com Timeline Photos

Our Festival de Cannes hosts Ben Lyons and Jacqueline M. Wood faced-off center stage to determine who was better at exacting the 9-Step Pouring Ritual. Who are you rooting for?  #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection The Duel | World Draught Masters

After their country finals, Draught Masters from around the world found themselves competing in downtown Cannes, France. It set the stage for this year’s 17th annual World Draught Masters competition. #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection

Building up to the main event, our twenty-two World Draught Master contestants prepared for a life changing competition in the heart of Cannes, France. #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection Behind the Competition | World Draught Masters 2014

The 2014 World Draught Masters held during the Festival de Cannes was one to remember. Throughout the night our twenty-two competitors from around the globe dueled multiple opponents to determine the new champion! #worlddraughtmasters. #herestoperfection The 2014 World Draught Masters
The presentation of a master. Congratulations to Belgium's Marjolein Geuens. The official 2014 World Draught Master! #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection Timeline Photos

Watch our twenty-two competitors complete their final training, with the ultimate goal of obtaining the coveted title of World Draught Master 2014. #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection Training the Competitors | World Draught Masters 2014
Some advice from our World Draught Masters competitors: Charisma, flair and personality are just as important as the 9-Step Pour. #worlddraughtmasters #herestoperfection Timeline Photos
The stage is set for the 2014 Stella Artois World Draught Masters competition on May 17th. #WorldDraughtMasters #herestoperfection Timeline Photos

Now in its 17th year, The World Draught Masters Championship celebrates the care and craftsmanship that goes into serving the perfect Stella Artois.  #WorldDraughtMasters #herestoperfection Timeline Photos
The World Draught Masters Championship seeks just one thing: the Perfect Pour of Stella Artois. Who will conquer the competition this year? Timeline Photos

Belgian Allaine Schaiko currently holds the title of World Draught Master. He will defend his country’s title at this year’s World Draught Masters competition on May 17th. Learn more about him here: Meet 2012 World Draft Master: Allaine Schaiko
Celebrating craftsmanship, attention to detail and the perfect pour we’re proud to announce the World Draught Masters competition is one month away on May 17th.  #WorldDraughtMasters Timeline Photos
The 2012 World Draught Masters Finals: exhilarating, exciting and unforgettable.  Stella Artois

The World Draught Masters Finals are wrapped. Here’s a look at the some of the most exciting scenes from the night: Stella Artois The 2012 World Draught Masters Finals was a night of celebration and sophistication in Montreal, culminating in the crowning of a new World Draught Master.

BARTENDER TIP 5: Space is always at a premium, so be
sure to purchase pieces for your home-bar that can be
repurposed. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos
BARTENDER TIP 4: Using a table large enough to accommodate drinks and a selection of food makes for the perfect party hosting experience. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos

BARTENDER TIP 3: Ensure food is available throughout
the party. Keep the dips, chips and crudité refreshed and
remind your guests to eat to keep the party going. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos
BARTENDER TIP 2: The location of your home-bar is crucial. Choose a spot that has easy flow from more than one direction and set your bar table there. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos

Stella Artois solicited home-bartending advice from
legendary New York City bartender, Dale DeGroff.

BARTENDER TIP 1: Is to only turn up the lights to wind
down a party. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos
Stella Artois drinkers cherish the craftsmanship that goes into each Chalice. Recreate the iconic Stella Artois pour at home. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos
Stella Artois and New Girl star Jake Johnson celebrate the launch of the in-home bar PerfectDraft device. Jake Johnson debuts the Stella Artois PerfectDraft Device
Stella Artois revealed the new PerfectDraft device that allows you to get the perfect pour every time, in the luxury of your home. Stella Artois Presents The Perfect Pour At Home

Stella Artois hosted a memorable evening along with New Girl actor Jake Johnson, to commemorate the launch of our exciting new home pouring device: PerfectDraft. Stella Artois presents the PerfectDraft Launch Party
Our guest bartender and reigning Stella Artois World Draft Master, Allaine Schaiko, treated the crowd to home draft pouring tips using PerfectDraft. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos

“I’d love to see Stella Artois from a PerfectDraft in my own home bar,” remarked New Girl star Jake Johnson. “Bars are beloved, for good reason, so any movement to recreate the experience at home is worth supporting.” #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos
On Tuesday, we hosted a memorable evening along with New Girl actor Jake Johnson, to commemorate the launch of our exciting new device: PerfectDraft. #PerfectDraft Timeline Photos

The light blue hue of the Mediterranean Sea lines the coast of the Côte d’Azur where the Festival de Cannes was in full swing. Tourists, filmmakers and lovers of France flocked to the port town to be bathed in the European sun. Have a look and experience Cannes, France firsthand. #cannes2014 #herestoperfection A Look back at Cannes

The Perfectionists at Cannes presents On the Red Carpet. We chatted with celebrities from some of the most talked about films at the Festival de Cannes to get their firsthand experiences walking the famous red carpet. Relive their stories here. #cannes2014 #herestoperfection Perfectionists: Walking the red carpet at Cannes

The Jury for the Cinéfondation and Short Films at the Festival de Cannes was announced this week. Stella Artois is proud to learn fellow Belgian Jean-Pierre Dardenne, a director, scriptwriter and producer will preside over the jury in their decision to award the Palme d’Or for short films!   Festival de Cannes - From 16 to 27 may 2012

Connoisseurs of cinema will delight in the pleasures of the Festival de Cannes. Allow us to invite you to experience all Cannes Cinema Club has to offer by following your local Stella Artois fan page on Facebook! http://on.fb.me/H46Rfg Timeline Photos
